about-me.title: About me
about-me.description-a: I am a highly motivated and progress-focused Web Developer with 3 years of background in development and designing
about-me.description-b: with specialization in Web Design implementation in a number of themes and builders.
about-me.description-c: With a track record of initiative and dependability, I have devised strategic initiatives which I believe wiII prove valuable to you.
about-me.description-d: Throughout the course of my career, I am a capable and consistent problem-solver skilled at prioritizing and managing tasks with proficiency. I am progressive minded and in tune with new developments in my field.
about-me.description-e: I have proven to be effective and collaborative with strong innovative talents. I enjoy collective brainstorming sessions which we coordinate activities to achieve a common goal.
about-me.description-f: I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you and I'm looking forward to join your team.

descriptions.Img2save: Website to download wallpapers. Powered by unsplash, pixabay and flickr APIs.
descriptions.MasPlay: Website for video game rental business, users can register and earn points to redeem for prizes.
descriptions.Guárico: Website for the Guárico state, located in Venezuela, make with Django.
descriptions.Chat messages: Real time chat using socket.io and react.
descriptions.nested-selects: Library for manage multiple nested <select>, made in vanillajs.
descriptions.nested-selects-react: Component/Library for react that makes it easy to handle multiple nested <select>. Documentation included.
descriptions.Mercadoabierto: A Mercadolibre marketplace clone, browse among many products, you can register to buy or sell
descriptions.Aquetasa: App for calculate the dollar price in Venezuela with different exchange rates.
descriptions.LibraryAudio: Web to download background music tracks that can be used in advertising videos.

education.title: Education
education.description-a: Most of my knowledge I have acquired online, I am a self-taught person who trains with courses, tutorials, reading code and above all a lot of practice.
education.description-b: The CMS and Programming Languages that I use the most to train are Wordpress, shopify, liquid, PHP, Html, CSS, Wix, Drupal, Kartra, Volution, Webflow, Javascript.
education.subtitle: Fall in love with my features
